LanguageData.CookMisosiru.label: Cook Miso soup (2)
LanguageData.CookMisosiru.description: Dissolve Miso in boiling water and add your favorite ingredients.
LanguageData.CookSoyMilkShake.label: Cook Soy milkshake (2)
LanguageData.CookSoyMilkShake.description: A plain, ordinary milkshake-only it's made with soy milk and not that other stuff.
